page.title: 12INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: Greta Lewis She has lived for 28 years in Yatton and is an influential member of the community. She has been a member of the Parochial Church Council, of the Parish Council where she was the first lady finance chairman and the first lady chairman. She was a member of the Woodspring District Council for seven years. She is Chairman of the management committee for the Citizens' Advice Bureau and the Avon Co-ordinating Group of the Weston Community Health Council. With her husband, Greta started the first youth club in Yatton known as Church Life. She has been a governor of the local Junior School for the last ll years and has served as both chairman and vice chairman.
